member.param: The original, non-overridden, attribute set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Configuration.Design.ViewModel.MetadataCollection.Override(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Attribute})
member.summary: Applies a set of overridden values to the base set of attributes.
member.param: The set of s to apply.
member.remarks:
The provided attributes are compared, by their type, to the internal set of attributes. And are updated:
If there is no attribute of a particular type in the internal set, that attribute is added to the set.
If there is an attribute of a particular type in the internal set already and the attribute does not allow multiple instances, then the internal attribute is replaced.
If there is an attribute of a particular type in the internal set already and the attribute does allow multiple instances, then the attribute is added to the internal set of attributes.
If multiple attributes of the same type are provided in and the attribute is does not allow multiple, only the first attribute will be used in replacing the existing attribute.

member.returns: The resultant set of instances with overridden values applied.
